attributes.action: Getting all the Pedestrian Crossings on the stock road made Pelican crossings and zebra crossing at the top St andrews drive near health centre
attributes.additional_details: The key objective of this petition to get the department local government and communites to look at make money available to make all the Pedestrian Crossings along stock road pellcan crossings for safety reasons for old people and school pupils and people living Billericay area who use the stock road every day.
